resources.string: M. K. ČIURLIONIS NATIONAL ART MUSEUM

Kaunas Castle is the oldest stone castle in Lithuania built in the 14th century to resist crusaders’ attacks. A settlement started forming around this Gothic defensive building, growing into the present-day city. The castle was first mentioned in 1361.

The construction of Kaunas Town Hall, also called the White Swan, was started in July 1542 according to the architect Benediktas Choinauskis’ project. The building, which is several hundred years old, has been reconstructed more than once.

The Ninth Fort is one of the defences of Kaunas fortress and a historical and architectural monument protected by the state. It reveals Jews’ tragedy in Lithuania and tells the story of Kaunas Ghetto and massacre.
In 2011, Pažaislis monastery opened heritage exposition and educational class in southern officina of monastery, which has a vaulted cellar, equipped with a small cinema.

Together with the Kaunas Fire and Rescue Service,the museum collects exhibits related to fire fighting in Lithuania. The Museum‘s publishing house „Plieno sparnai“ was founded in 1991 and publishes aviators‘ recollections.
The museum contains archaeological finds, weapons, firearms, ammunition, army uniforms of various states, objects and documents, relating to the transatlantic flight of the "Lituanica".

Established in 1921, the M. K. Čiurlionis National Museum of Art has turned into one of the oldest and largest art museums in Lithuania. Best place to become acquainted with the development of Lithuanian and international art history and culture.
BO – a bar (you can even call it a beer bar) in Kaunas Old Town, with a long history, 20 varieties of draught beer and laid-back and friendly staff. Address:Muitinės g. 9, Kaunas.
One of the finest entertainment places in Kaunas! Basement by BarBar\'a has ame fantastic atmosphere! Address:Vilniaus g. 56.
RePUBlic – English style pub at Kaunas city center. Address:Laisvės al.57, Kaunas
"Gargaras" is a place for concerts, DJ performances, culture, art and other digital events. Address:Raudondvario pl. 101, Kaunas.
City Hall is located in the basement cocktail bar Dejavu Party Bar "invites every Thursday, Friday and Saturday plunged into a whirl of fun. Address:Rotušės a. 2, Kaunas.
Lizdas - bar at Kaunas city center. Address:Nepriklausomybės aikštė 12, Kaunas.
„BAJORKIEMIS city“- restaurant in city center offering tradicional Lithuanian cuisine. Address:Kęstučio g. 86 / I. Kanto g. 18, Kaunas.
The highly cherished Lithuanian cuisine offers to taste a variety of dishes certified with the National Heritage and Culinary Heritage logos. Address:Valančiaus g. 11, Kaunas.
„Čili kaimas“ - traditional Lithuanian food restaurant.Address: Karaliaus Mindaugo g. 49 (PC „Akropolis“), Kaunas.
Restaurant kitchen not only Lithuanian. Here you can taste the charcoal-grilled fish, chicken, lamb, beef and pork dishes. Address:Savanorių pr. 290A, Kaunas.
“Pas Stanley” is a place where you will get food, prepared by experienced cooks from carefully selected and always fresh ingredients, for prices you do not expected. Address:Vilniaus g. 24, Kaunas.

The tour takes you through the main attractions in the city: Kaunas Castle, St. George’s Church, Catholic Seminary, City Hall Square, Jesuit Church and Monastery, Holy Trinity Church, Cathedral Basilica and more.
THE OLD TOWN SECRETS IN KAUNAS
A good opportunity to visit the most important and amusing places: see “White Swan”, Thunder House, Sun clock, Vytautas Church, and Kaunas castle. Tour is in the evening.

Discover when and where beer brewing started, its advantages and disadvantages. Find out what beer Lithuanians brewed first in Europe. Taste some special beer appreciated by Moscow millionaires. Observe the brewing process.
A trip by boat from Kaunas to Birštonas. It takes you to visit beautiful little city of Birštonas and takes you back to Kaunas.
